text: In Your Hands or Bain Edik is a 1960 Egyptian romantic comedy movie directed by Youssef Chahine and starring Magda, Shukri Sarhan, Naima Wasfi, Abdel Fatah Al Kasri, Zeenat Sidqi. ==Other websites== * Category:1960 romance movies Category:1960 comedy movies Category:1960 romantic comedy movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:Movies directed by Youssef Chahine
title: In Your Hands
